alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 20 at 10:12PM PST until February 23 at 3:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY TO 3 AM THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 7 to 10 feet with sets to 14 feet. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas and Orange County Coastal Areas. * WHEN...From 8 PM Tuesday to 3 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of the strong winds, a building northwest swell, and strong storm surge onto beaches that have been eroded from previous winter storms may result in flooding over beach parking lots and boardwalks during the Wednesday morning high tide.
info.instruction: Take a hard pass on swimming and surfing Wednesday.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
